name: Spotlight English
description: Spotlight English is a 15 minute audio programme for English learners. It uses a special method of broadcasting. Compared with standard English programming, Spotlight uses a slower speaking speed, and a smaller vocabulary. This makes Spotlight easier to understand for listeners around the world. The Spotlight English app offers 5 programs every week.  CATEGORIES:  Entertainment  Science & Technology  Society  Healthy Living  Relationships  Biography  Your Life  MORE ENGLISH:  1000 Most Common Phrases.  1500 Most Common Words.  Idioms and Phrases in English.  Most Common Phrases with audio supported.  Most Common Words with audio supported.  English Idioms & Phrases  English Useful Expressions  Essay for IELTS.  A high TOEFL, IELTS, or TOEIC   Irregular verbs.  American Slang.  English Idioms by Categories.  English Phrasal Verbs.  English Pronunciation.  English SAT Words.  English Tenses.  Apps Features:  Free all features.  Listen & Read lesson with Audio & Transcripts  Search lesson.  Bookmark manager.   Download audio file.  Background Audio Mode.  Two listen mode: Online or Offline.  Lets improve all of your English skills: English Listening, English Grammar and English Speaking right now.
